name: Clockwork Mantis
movement: walking speed of 40 feet, agile for its size
description: The Clockwork Mantis is a large mechanical guardian with serrated blades and a tough exterior. Its enhanced dexterity allows it to excel in stealth and ambushes.
memorable: Its ability to become invisible and effectively ambush foes enhances its combat strategies.
goals: Typically serves as a mechanical guardian or enforcer.
relations: May be found alongside other constructs or in the service of an artificer.
environment: Often found in dungeons or in the service of those requiring mechanical defense.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, as well as non-magical attacks unless made with adamantine.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, limiting its cognitive and social capabilities.
attacks: Can perform multiple serrated blade attacks followed by a powerful bite, utilizing stealth to emerge from invisibility.
most_powerful_ability: Hobbling Strike can immobilize targets on successful opportunity attacks.
senses: Possesses darkvision and has a passive Perception score of 15, enhancing its stealth and awareness.
skills: Skilled in perception and stealth, making it a formidable ambusher.
additional_information: Immune to many conditions such as charmed and paralyzed.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells.
Its form remains unchanged due to immutable form ability.
Turns invisible until it attacks, enhancing its surprise attacks.
test_queries: large construct that can turn invisible
agile mechanical creature with hobbling strike
